svg.text: McCzarny recently focused heavily on developing
and refining his ghsummary tool. He introduced
a new strict mode to the ghsummary tool,
enabling detailed commit analysis using an LLM.
This included adding a mode parameter to the
command-line usage and the GitHub action. He
also updated the LLM model used for generating
summaries in ghsummary. Concurrently, he
continued work on his black-fat-cat project. In
that project, he configured the cat detection
system for long-term observation. He also added
a time-based rule to trigger the system only
during specific night hours. McCzarny made
several updates to his upload-image GitHub
action. These included adding support for
Cloudinary and a sub-action to delete images.
He also fixed tests and updated documentation
for upload-image, and asked for ideas on
alternative upload services.
Generated on: Sun May 18 02:00:02 2025
